props.name: dateAdapter
props.docs:
Date adapter, for custom parsing/formatting.
Must be object with a `parse` function which accepts a `string` and returns a `Date`,
and a `format` function which accepts a `Date` and returns a `string`.
Default is IS0-8601 parsing and formatting.

props.name: direction
props.docs:
Forces the opening direction of the calendar modal to be always left or right.
This setting can be useful when the input is smaller than the opening date picker
would be as by default the picker always opens towards right.

props.name: disabled
props.docs:
Makes the date picker input component disabled. This prevents users from being able to
interact with the input, and conveys its inactive state to assistive technologies.

props.name: firstDayOfWeek
props.docs:
Which day is considered first day of the week? `0` for Sunday, `1` for Monday, etc.
Default is Monday.

props.name: helperText
props.docs: (optional) Helper text

props.name: identifier
props.docs: Adds a unique identifier for the date picker input. Use this instead of html `id` attribute.

props.name: label
props.docs: (optional) Label

props.name: localization
props.type: { buttonLabel: string; placeholder: string; selectedDateMessage: string; prevMonthLabel: string; nextMonthLabel: string; monthSelectLabel: string; yearSelectLabel: string; closeLabel: string; keyboardInstruction: string; calendarHeading: string; dayNames: DayNames; monthNames: MonthsNames; monthNamesShort: MonthsNames; locale: string | string[]; }
props.docs:
Button labels, day names, month names, etc, used for localization.
Default is English.

values.type: { buttonLabel: string; placeholder: string; selectedDateMessage: string; prevMonthLabel: string; nextMonthLabel: string; monthSelectLabel: string; yearSelectLabel: string; closeLabel: string; keyboardInstruction: string; calendarHeading: string; dayNames: DayNames; monthNames: MonthsNames; monthNamesShort: MonthsNames; locale: string

props.name: max
props.docs:
Maximum date allowed to be picked. Must be in IS0-8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.
This setting can be used alone or together with the min property.

props.name: min
props.docs:
Minimum date allowed to be picked. Must be in IS0-8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.
This setting can be used alone or together with the max property.

props.name: name
props.docs: Name of the date picker input.

props.name: required
props.docs: Should the input be marked as required?

props.name: role
props.docs: Defines a specific role attribute for the date picker input.

props.name: size
props.docs: (optional) Size

props.name: status
props.docs: (optional) Status

props.name: value
props.docs: Date value. Must be in IS0-8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.

methods.name: hide
methods.docs:
Hide the calendar modal. Set `moveFocusToButton` to false to prevent focus
returning to the date picker's button. Default is true.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.docs: Sets focus on the date picker's input. Use this method instead of the global `focus()`.

methods.name: show
methods.docs: Show the calendar modal, moving focus to the calendar inside.

events.docs: Event emitted the date picker input is blurred.
Event emitted when a date is selected.
Event emitted the date picker input is focused.

props.docs: (optional) When using the icon as standalone, make it meaningful for accessibility

props.name: decorative
props.docs: (optional) If `true` the svg element will get aria-hidden="true"

props.name: fill
props.docs: The SVG `fill` attribute

props.name: focusable
props.docs: (optional) If `true` the icon can receive focus

props.name: name
props.docs:
A name that will be used to reference an SVG object defined elsewhere,
via `<use xlink:href="">`. `icon-` will be prepended to the name, so if
you pass `circle`, it will look for for the `icon-circle` id
e.g. `<use xlink:href="#icon-circle">`.
If there is no element in the document with the id by the name provided,
this component will render empty.

props.name: path
props.docs: A path shape to be used in the `d` attribute of a path element.

props.name: size
props.docs:
Will be used for both `width` and `height`, all icons are square.
Keep in mind the `viewBox` attribute is set to "0 0 24 24".

components.readme:
# scale-sidebar-nav-collapsible

We tried adding ::-moz-focus-inner for the button but JSS fails to parse that selector.

- https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::-moz-focus-inner
- https://stackoverflow.com/a/199319
